phones.title: Redmi Note 5 Pro (64 GB)
phones.description: Meet the Redmi Note 5 Pro - the elegantly designed smartphone that comes with a powerful Snapdragon 636 processor, which outperforms its predecessor by up to 40%. From capturing enchanting pictures with the dual rear-camera setup and an amazing 20 MP front camera
